name: Heart of Depth
title: Shipborne Afterthought: Heart of Depth
desc: "For all deaths are in vain. There is no saving those who indulge in the past."
in_play_description: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Hydro.

skills.desc: When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Hydro Die. (Once per Round) Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Hydro. (A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
